org.apache.usergrid.android.client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usergrid.java.client.Client
      • org.apache.usergrid.android.client.Client

  • public class Client
extends org.usergrid.java.client.Client
    The Client class for accessing the Usergrid API. Start by instantiating this class though the appropriate constructor.

                             Object data,
                             String... segments)

      • queryUsersAsync

        public void queryUsersAsync(String ql,
                   QueryResultsCallback callback)

        Parameters:
        ql -
        callback -

      • createGroupAsync

        public void createGroupAsync(String groupPath,
                    ApiResponseCallback callback)
        Creates a group with the specified group path. Group paths can be slash ("/") delimited like file paths for hierarchical group relationships. Executes asynchronously in background and the callbacks are called in the UI thread.
        Parameters:
        groupPath -
        callback -

      • createGroupAsync

        public void createGroupAsync(String groupPath,
                    String groupTitle,
                    ApiResponseCallback callback)
        Creates a group with the specified group path and group title. Group paths can be slash ("/") deliminted like file paths for hierarchical group relationships. Executes asynchronously in background and the callbacks are called in the UI thread.
        Parameters:
        groupPath -
        groupTitle -
        callback -
